name: Soldier: 76
description: Armed with cutting-edge weaponry, including an experimental pulse rifle that’s capable of firing spirals of high-powered rockets, Soldier: 76 has the speed and support know-how of a highly trained warrior.

abilities.name: Biotic Field
abilities.description: Deploy a field that heals you and your allies.

abilities.name: Helix Rockets
abilities.description: Launch a volley of explosive rockets.

abilities.name: Tactical Visor
abilities.description: Automatically aims your weapon at targets in view.

story: The former commander of Overwatch turned physically-enhanced vigilante, Jack Morrison travels the world hunting those responsible for the downfall of Overwatch. It is unknown whether he seeks justice... or revenge.
